data.message: You ain't gonna sell 2 copies if you press a double album,admit it,  fuck it, while we coming out in the open, I'm doin acid,crack,smack,coke, and smoking dope then, my name is Marshall Mathers I'm an alcoholic, I've got a disease and they don't know what to call it, better hide your wallet cause I'm coming up quick to strip yo cash, bought a ticket to your concert just to come and whip your ass bitch I'm comin out swinging, so fast it'll make your eyes spin, you gettin knocked the fuck out like Mike Tyson, the proof is in the puddin, just ask DeShawn holten, I'll slit your motherfuckin throat worse than Ron goldman! GOAT!... flipped rap on its ear like a dropped corn, fuck top 5 bitch I'm top 4 and that includes biggie and pac whore and I've got an evil twin so who do think that 3rd and 4th spots for!? huge thank you to Mr mathers, he has not only opened my eyes to what REAL rap is, but I've gotten through more difficult times listening to him then I have ever had going to " a psychologist, tryin to list why I have all these underlying problems thinking he can try and solve em"... the more music you make the better my day goes, keep Killin it!

replies.message: Hahaha, I was gonna put that in, but only cause alcoholic and what to call it, rhyme... saying "hi marshal" might have taken the readers eye away from EMs Ballin ass rap
Oh and btw... it's marshall... two L's
Anybody else read this post to the melody? I know I couldn't stop myself!
Evil twin and legacy are on mmlp2

Yes, I know this, but to say he's GOAT you have to list who's in his range.... biggie and pac, not many others...and saying he's brought me through more tough times, I was referring to him having a psychologist talk to him about underlying problems when he didn't need it, he just needed his music
I take therapy, through my music :)
I was born in 97 I was reaching far back for Eminem. I don't include tupac or biggie in my top 5's.
Which is why you have a SpongeBob profile pic, makes sense now
am in afrka but by myself i lik emnm raper .
I'm 90% sure you haven't heard Cocaine by Eminem.
